src:
Septic Tank Meledak di Cakung, Petugas Penyedot Tinja Tewas
05 Nov 2019, 01:55 by Adam Prireza, Clara Maria Tjandra Dewi H.
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Seorang sopir mobil penyedot tinja berinisial S, 44 tahun, tewas karena septic tank meledak di Kapling Blok O, Kelurahan Jatinegara, Cakung, Jakarta Timur, pada Senin, 4 November 2019.
Kepala Unit Reserse Kriminal Kepolisian Sektor Cakung Ajun Komisaris Tom Sirait membenarkan hal tersebut. “Kejadian sekitar pukul 11.30 WIB,” kata Tom dalam keterangan tertulis, Selasa, 5 November 2019.
Kejadian berawal saat S datang ke lokasi untuk menyedot tinja di rumah milik Agus Sholeh sekitar pukul 11.00 WIB. Setelah penyedotan selesai, ia meyakinkan Agus bahwa penyedotan sudah selesai dengan membakar koran dan memasukkannya ke dalam septis tank.
“Bukti proses penyedotan tinja telah selesai dengan koran yang dibakar dimasukkan dalam septi tank telah padam,” kata Tom.
Agus pun yakin kalau proses penyedotan telah usai dan beranjak untuk mengambil uang untuk membayar jasa S. Tanpa diduga, tiba-tiba septi tank tersebut meledak dengan suara yang cukup kencang.
Akibat kejadian tersebut, S terjatuh ke dalam septic tank dan meninggal dengan kondisi wajah terbakar. Jenazah S lantas dibawa ke Rumah Sakit Harapan Jayakarta, sementara polisi masih memasang garis polisi di lokasi kejadian septic tank meledak guna olah tempat kejadian perkara.
text:
Septic Tank Explodes in Cakung, Officers of Suction Fecal Killed
05 Nov 2019, 01:55 by Adam Prireza, Clara Maria Tjandra Dewi H.
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - A stool extractor driver with the initials S, 44 years old, died because a septic tank exploded in Kapling Blok O, Jatinegara Urban Village, Cakung, East Jakarta, on Monday, November 4, 2019.
Head of the Cakung Sector Police Criminal Investigation Unit, Commissioner Tom Sirait, confirmed this. "It happened around 11.30 WIB," Tom said in a written statement, Tuesday, November 5, 2019.
The incident began when S came to the location to suck feces in Agus Sholeh's house at around 11:00 WIB. After the desludging was finished, he assured Agus that the desludging was finished by burning the newspaper and putting it in the septic tank.
"Evidence of the desludging process has been completed with the burned newspaper put in septi tanks gone out," Tom said.
Agus was convinced that the desludging process was over and moved to get money to pay for S. services. Unexpectedly, suddenly like the tank exploded with a loud voice.
As a result of the incident, S fell into a septic tank and died with a burning face. S's body was then taken to Harapan Jayakarta Hospital, while the police were still putting up a police line at the scene of the explosion of the septic tank to process the crime scene.
